nodes.text: During the Second Battle of Geonosis this B1-series battle droid served under Poggle the Lesser. This droid and O.M.5 followed Poggle the Lesser for as long as they could in a sandstorm.
This droid questioned where Poggle the Lesser was leading it and O.M.5, and notably showed concern when O.M.5 disappeared. Despite this the droid followed Poggle's orders to keep going.
